elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Read the basic knowledge "The state" carefully. Then answer the following knowledge questions.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What three elements make up a state?
elements.correctAnswer: State people, state territory, state authority

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Where are the purpose and tasks of the Swiss state defined?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What is the main purpose of the state in dictatorships?
elements.correctAnswer: to maintain the power and privileges of those in power

elements.name: question4
elements.title: How is power passed on in monarchies?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Who exercises power in a dictatorship? Name three possibilities.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Read the basic knowledge "The state" carefully. Then answer the following knowledge questions.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What does the distribution of power look like in a dictatorship and in a democracy?
elements.correctAnswer: Dictatorship: from top to bottom/ Democracy: from bottom to top

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Which of Switzerland's neighboring countries was ruled by a dictatorship from 1933 to 1945?

elements.name: question8
elements.title: What is the German term for democracy?

elements.name: question9
elements.title: What is meant by the term "popular sovereignty"?
elements.correctAnswer: The people freely and independently determine the rules of state coexistence.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: What are the three different forms of state structure?
elements.correctAnswer: Unitary state, federal state, confederation of states

elements.name: panel3
elements.title: Read the basic knowledge "The state" carefully. Then answer the following knowledge questions.

elements.name: question11
elements.title: Which countries also have a federal structure like Switzerland? Name three.

elements.name: question12
elements.title: How is Switzerland's federal structure structured from the bottom up?

elements.name: question13
elements.title: What is meant by the principle of the rule of law?
elements.correctAnswer: The state authorities must comply with the law.

elements.name: question14
elements.title: To which three authorities is power divided in a democracy?
elements.correctAnswer: Legislative (= legislative authority), executive (= executive authority), judiciary (= judicial authority)
